mapper.select: SELECT a.title, a.id, s.id song_id, s.album_id, s.title song_title, s.length song_length, s.track song_track FROM album a LEFT JOIN song s ON a.id=s.album_id LEFT JOIN album_locale b ON a.id = b.album_id LEFT JOIN locale l ON b.locale_id = l.id WHERE a.title LIKE CONCAT(#{title},'%') AND (l.language_code = #{locale} OR l.language_code = 'all')

SELECT s.title, s.id, s.album_id, s.track, s.length FROM song s LEFT JOIN album a ON s.album_id = a.id LEFT JOIN album_locale b ON a.id = b.album_id LEFT JOIN locale l ON b.locale_id = l.id WHERE s.title LIKE CONCAT(#{title},'%') AND (l.language_code = #{locale} OR l.language_code = 'all')

SELECT i.title, i.id, s.id song_id, s.album_id, s.title song_title, s.length song_length, s.track song_track, i.language_code FROM (SELECT a.title, a.id, l.language_code FROM album a LEFT JOIN album_locale b ON a.id = b.album_id LEFT JOIN locale l ON b.locale_id = l.id WHERE l.language_code = #{locale} OR l.language_code = 'all' LIMIT #{limit} OFFSET #{offset}) i LEFT JOIN song s ON i.id=s.album_id;
SELECT count(a.id) as totalCount FROM album a LEFT JOIN album_locale b ON a.id = b.album_id LEFT JOIN locale l ON b.locale_id = l.id WHERE (l.language_code = #{locale} OR l.language_code = 'all')
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM playlist WHERE playlist_name = #{playlist_name} AND user_id = #{user_id}
mapper.select: SELECT id FROM song WHERE album_id = #{album_id}
SELECT id, playlist_name, user_id FROM playlist WHERE user_id = #{user_id}
